text: Jack Haley (August 10, 1897 â€“ June 6, 1979) was an American singer, actor, and dancer. He played the Tin Woodman in the 1939 MGM movie The Wizard of Oz. Haley was born in Boston, Massachusetts. Haley died of a heart attack at the UCLA Medical Center in Los Angeles, California at the age of 80. ==References== Category:Actors from Boston Category:American dancers Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:American movie actors Category:Singers from Boston Category:1898 births Category:1979 deaths
title: Jack Haley
